data.headline: Due diligence: Retail Food Group attacks the short sellers
data.summary: Retail Food Group is perhaps best known as Queensland's other pizza company.  It's also now one of the market's top 20 shorted stocks.

data.headline: Retailers profit from self-help
data.summary: Small cap retailers are increasingly relying on self help measures rather than patchy consumer spending to grow sales and earnings.

data.headline: Retailers reducing stocks, paying suppliers faster
data.summary: Almost a year after the collapse of Dick Smith, retailers are finally getting the message about keeping stock levels under control, a report says.

data.headline: Retail Food Group buys Hudson Pacific for $88m
data.summary: The owner of franchise networks Donut King, Gloria Jean's Coffees and Brumby's Bakery, will buy food company Hudson Pacific for $88m.

data.headline: Domino's accuser Delivery Command offers helping hand to Eagle Boys
data.summary: Nathan Parrott, who is suing Domino's, has offered his driver tracking tech to struggling Eagle Boys franchisees for free.

data.headline: Domino's, Retail Food Group to taste test Eagle Boys
data.summary: Domino's Pizza and Retail Food Group are expected to taste test rival pizza franchise Eagle Boys Pizza, which collapsed last week.
